Enabled.help_text: If enabled, the version details will be extracted from the InputFile binary at the offsets specified. If disabled, the version must be specified manually.

InputFile.help_text: Binary file from which to extract the version details.

VersionMajorByte0Offset.help_text: Offset of Major Version number's LSB in InputFile.

VersionMajorByte1Offset.help_text: Offset of Major Version number's MSB in InputFile.

VersionMinorByte0Offset.help_text: Offset of Minor Version number's LSB in InputFile.

VersionMinorByte1Offset.help_text: Offset of Minor Version number's MSB in InputFile.

VersionHotfixByte0Offset.help_text: Offset of Hotfix Version number's LSB in InputFile.

VersionHotfixByte1Offset.help_text: Offset of Hotfix Version number's MSB in InputFile.

VersionBuildByte0Offset.help_text: Offset of Build Version number's LSB in InputFile.

VersionBuildByte1Offset.help_text: Offset of Build Version number's MSB in InputFile.

Name.help_text: Name to use as metadata filename in output binary.
